apis.description: Returns the details of the outcome with the given id.

operations.notes: Returns the details of the outcome with the given id.

apis.description:
Modify an existing outcome. Fields not provided are left as is;
unrecognized fields are ignored.

If any new ratings are provided, the combination of all new ratings
provided completely replace any existing embedded rubric criterion; it is
not possible to tweak the ratings of the embedded rubric criterion.

A new embedded rubric criterion's mastery_points default to the maximum
points in the highest rating if not specified in the mastery_points
parameter. Any new ratings lacking a description are given a default of "No
description". Any new ratings lacking a point value are given a default of
0.

operations.notes:
Modify an existing outcome. Fields not provided are left as is;
unrecognized fields are ignored.

If any new ratings are provided, the combination of all new ratings
provided completely replace any existing embedded rubric criterion; it is
not possible to tweak the ratings of the embedded rubric criterion.

A new embedded rubric criterion's mastery_points default to the maximum
points in the highest rating if not specified in the mastery_points
parameter. Any new ratings lacking a description are given a default of "No
description". Any new ratings lacking a point value are given a default of
0.

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description:
A friendly name shown in reports for outcomes with cryptic titles,
such as common core standards names.

parameters.name: vendor_guid
parameters.description: A custom GUID for the learning standard.

parameters.name: mastery_points
parameters.description: The new mastery threshold for the embedded rubric criterion.

parameters.name: ratings[description]
parameters.description: The description of a new rating level for the embedded rubric criterion.

parameters.name: ratings[points]
parameters.description:
The points corresponding to a new rating level for the embedded rubric
criterion.

parameters.name: calculation_int
parameters.description: The new calculation int.  Only applies if the calculation_method is "decaying_average" or "n_mastery"

operations.summary: Get aligned assignments for an outcome in a course for a particular student

url.description: the URL for fetching/updating the outcome. should be treated as opaque

context_id.description: the context owning the outcome. may be null for global outcomes

description.description: description of the outcome. omitted in the abbreviated form.

vendor_guid.description: A custom GUID for the learning standard.

points_possible.description: maximum points possible. included only if the outcome embeds a rubric criterion. omitted in the abbreviated form.

mastery_points.description: points necessary to demonstrate mastery outcomes. included only if the outcome embeds a rubric criterion. omitted in the abbreviated form.

calculation_method.description: the method used to calculate a students score

calculation_int.description: this defines the variable value used by the calculation_method. included only if calculation_method uses it

ratings.description: possible ratings for this outcome. included only if the outcome embeds a rubric criterion. omitted in the abbreviated form.

can_edit.description: whether the current user can update the outcome

can_unlink.description: whether the outcome can be unlinked

assessed.description: whether this outcome has been used to assess a student

has_updateable_rubrics.description: whether updates to this outcome will propagate to unassessed rubrics that have imported it

id.description: the id of the aligned learning outcome.

assignment_id.description: the id of the aligned assignment (null for live assessments).

assessment_id.description: the id of the aligned live assessment (null for assignments).

submission_types.description: a string representing the different submission types of an aligned assignment.

url.description: the URL for the aligned assignment.

title.description: the title of the aligned assignment.
